name: Thick as Thieves: Hide-and-Cheek
description:
Cheeky crooks are chomping cherished chattels - will they cheese it in time?

Looty and Booty, professional hamster burglars,  have got their orders from The Boss to nom and nab some serious treasure! Help Looty navigate pilfer-able properties, avoid the caw-ps, and get out with the goods before time runs out!

Sneak, Chomp and Roll in this side-scrolling 2D puzzler! 

How to play

Control Looty to collect the items on The Boss's List

  • Use ↑ ↓ → ← or WASD to run and move through pipes
  • Press E to store some loot in your cheeks!
  • Watch out! You're much thicker when you've got the loot! You can only move by rolling and won't fit in pipes!
  • Don't get spotted or you'll lose precious time!
  • Drop loot off at a flag! Grab all three items on The Boss's List to win!
A Game Off game

Thick as Thieves: Hide-and-Cheek is the third game by indie developers Dodgy Jammers for Game Off 2022 with the theme Cliché.

Our cliché is "Thick As Thieves", due to the strong bond of friendship between Looty & Booty, but also because they get THICK when stealing!! 👌😩

We created it in our spare time over a month for Game Off 2022. The original version was submitted on 1st December 2022. The source code in GitHub can be found here: https://github.com/SHall21/GameOff2022Source
